model_architecture.datasets: Train, test, and val located in a gcp bucket. Video captures are manually sampled and selected to train the model
model_architecture.output: Bounding-box location and semantic segmentation of an object of interest

usage.protocol: RPR.P3.001V3 - Robotic Protocol for sperm immobilization, loading and injection
usage.intended_usage: This model generates weights from training two neural networks (NN): NN1 is able to detect objects in real time and NN2 is able to segment an object of interest
usage.out_of_scope_usage: This model is used to locate and segment an oocyte during the ICSI procedure that is part of an internal IVF process
usage.misuse_or_malicious_use: This model must not be used outside conceivable prototypes

considerations.ethical_considerations: This model should not be used to detect and segment an oocyte outside the ICSI procedure because it was trained to detect in an specific routine.
